opinions.text:
ORDER
The state's motion to supplement the record as prayed is granted.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. LaSalle, Stephen Lichatin III, Special Asst. Attys. Gen., for plaintiff.
Alton W. Wiley, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Raymond MERCIER.
No. 79-441-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 21, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Faith A. LaSalle, Stephen Lichatin III, Special Asst. Attys. Gen., for plaintiff.
Alton W. Wiley, Providence, for defendant.
